verses.content: Chun, Itali rama lawnga kan fe ding an sukthlûk phingleh, Paula le mi intâng dang tuhai amanih,

Augusta pâwla mi sipai za hotu Julia an inkawltir a. Adramuttium khaw lawng Asia ram tuisuoriet panga khaw umhai sir dingah kan chuong a, tuisuorietah kan fe tah a; Makedonia rama mi Aristarka, Thessalonikaa mi kan kuomah a um a.
A zîngah Sidon khuo kan sîr a, chun, Julia chun Paula a sukṭha hleh a, insukhar dingin a ruolhai kuomah ân lêng tir a.
Chun, chutaka inthawkin, tuisuo- rietah kan fe nâwk a, thliin a ni naw tieng a mi nam leiin Kupra thlierkâr phên thli inupna tieng kan zâm a.
Chun, Kilikia ram le Pamphulia ram dep tuisuoriet kan khêl hnungin, Lukia rama Mura khuo kan tlung a.
Chutaka chun sipai za hotu chun, Alexandria khaw lawng, Itali ram sir ding chu a hmuh a: chutaka chun a mîn chuongtir a.
Ni sâwt tak damtê têin kan feh a, Knidos khaw zâwn intak takin kan tlung hrâm a, thliin a mi dangkîr leiin Salmoni hrûlah Kret thlierkâr phên thli inupna tieng kan zâm a;
chun intak takin vapang kan hrût kan hrût a, likilkawi, Mawi an ti chu kan tlung tah a; chu kâwla chun Lasai khuo a um.
chun, ni tamtak ân hmang ta lei le, lawnga fe ṭi a um ta leiin, (Bu nghei ni chu a lo khêl ta sih a), Paula chun anni chu ân fui a,
an kuomah, “Puhai, tuta lawnga fe hi sietna le bohmangna nasatak a tlung ding a nih ti ka hriet, thuomhnaw le lawng chunga chau ka ti nawh a; eini chunga khawm ka ti a nih,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, sipai za hotu chun, Paula thu hril nêk chun lawngpu le lawng neitu thu hril a awi lem a.

Chun, thlasik tuorna dingin likilkawi chu a rem naw leiin, a tam lemin chutaka inthawka tuisuorieta fe suoka, Phoiniki tlung hrâma, chutaka thlasik tuor an rawtpui a; Phoiniki chu Kret thlierkâra likil- kawi pakhat a nih, hmâr sak le sim sak sawng a nih.
Chun, sim thli chu damtê tea a hung hrâng phingle chun, an ditzâwng an hmu amanih an sâwn a, thîrchakai chu an khaisuok a, Kret thlierkâr pang chu an hrût an hrût a.
Nisienlakhawm, sâwt nawtê hnunga chun khawmuol tienga chun thli natak a hung hrâng thla tah a, chu thli chu Eurokuilo an ti hlak.
Chun, lawng chu a hung nam fûk a, thli tieng ân nghat thei naw phingleh kan inthla tah a, a mi lên a mi lên el tah a.
A hming Klauda thlierkâr chîtê phên thli inupna tieng chun kan zâm a, intak takin lawnglêng kan hum thei hrâm a.

Chun, an keisuok hnungin ṭhangpuina hrui dâm an hmang a, lawng hnuoitieng an lâk vêt a, an khuop a. Puon zarna iengkim an sukthlûk a, chuong naw chun Surtia inlên lût an ṭih a, chuongchun, a mi lên a mi lên tah a.
Chun, a zîngah tuifâwnin a mi vawr hrep lei chun, lawng thuom- hnaw chu tuiah an pei ṭan tah a.
A zîng nâwk chun anni kut ngeiin lawng thuomhnaw an pei suok nâwk tah a.
Chun, ni sâwttak nisa khawm, arasi khawm ân lang nawh a, thlipui namênin a mi nuoi nawh a, dam hrim kan inbeisei ta nawh a.
Chun, bu fa loa sâwttak an um hnungin, Paula anni laiah a ngîr a; “Puhai, Kret thlierkâra khan sût loin, ka thu kha awi unla, hieng sietna le bohmangna hi in tlung naw ding bah.
Nisienlakhawm, tukhawm hin lungmuongtaka um dingin kân fui cheu, nangni lai tukhawmin in hringna inhmang naw ti niu, lawng ruok hi chu ân hmang ding a ni hi.
A ta ka na, a rawng ka bâwl hlak Pathien kha, ama vântirko pakhat vawizân hin ka kâwlah a hung ngîr a, ka kuomah,
‘Paula, ṭi naw, Kaisar hmaah i ngîr ding a nih; chun, ngai rawh, lawnga i kuoma fehai po po khawm hi Pathienin a pêk che a nih,’ a mi ti a nih.
Chuleiin, Puhai, lungmuong- takin um ro; Pathien ka ring a, a mi hril ang peiin a um ding a nih.
Chuleiin, thlierkâr ienga manih a mi lên suok ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Adria tuisuorietah thliin khing tieng khing tieng a mi lên a mi lên a, zân sâwm le pali a tling zân chun, zân ril vêlah lawng mihai chun khâwlai khawmuol amanih tlung dingin an inhriet a.
Chuongchun, tui inthûkzie an inkhih a, hlam sâwmhni niin an hriet a; chun, sâwt nawtêah an inkhi nâwk a, hlam sâwm le panga niin an hriet a.
Chun, lawng mei tieng thîr- chakai pali an thlâk a, chuong naw chun lungkho lai mi lên suok hlau rawi a tih, an tih a; chun, khuo var kâr an nghâkhla hle a.
Chun, lawng mihai chun lawng lu tieng chun thîrchakaihai thlâk ding anga thaw tehlêmin, lawnglêng chu tuisuorietah an thlâk a, lawng chu tlân san an tum a.
Chu lai chun Paulain sipai za hotu le sipaihai kuoma chun, “Hienghai hi lawngah an um zing naw chun him thei naw ti niu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, sipaihai chun lawnglêng hruihai chu an ât tan a, an inthla tah a.
Chun, khawvar tâwm chun Paulain mi po po chu bu fa dingin a tir a, “Vawisûn hi ni sâwmpali a ni tah, iengkhawm fa loin in nghâk a, in nghei zing a nih.
Chuleiin, bu fa dingin ka tir cheu hi; in damna ding a ni hi; nangni laia tukhawm a samzai pakhat khawm bohmang naw ni,” a ta.
Chun, chu thu chu a hril zoin bei a lâk a, mi po po hmaa chun Pathien kuomah lâwmthu a hril tah a; chun, a khawi a, a fâk phut tah a.
Anni khawm thlamuongtakin an um a, bu an fâk ve tah a.
Lawnga mi chu kan rêngin za hni sâwmsari paruk kan nih.
Chun, an fâk khawp chun bu chu tuisuorietah an pei a, lawng an sukzâng deu a.
Chun, nisa a suok chun, khawmuol chu khâwlai am a ni an hriet nawh a; nisienlakhawm, khâwlai likilkawi amanih ṭieupho an hmuh a, chu chunga chun a thei chun lawng chu intlan suoktir an tum a.

Thîrchakai thlungnahai chu an ât tan a, tuisuorietah an mâksan a; chu ruol chun a karherna khuop- nahai chu an sût a, hma tieng puon zar chu thli imût ding zawngin an khai sâng a; ṭieupho chu an pan tah a.

Nisienlakhawm, tuihrât pahni intuokna hmunah kan lût hlau a, lawng chu hnuoi an insuktir tah a. Chuongchun, lawng lu tieng chu ân tâng tlat a, sukchâng ruol loin a um zing a, a mawngtieng ruok chu tuifâwn a nasat leiin a kawi ṭan tah a.
Chun, sipaihaiin intânghai chu sukhlum an rawt a, chuong naw chun, tui inhlieu kai dâm um an ta, tlân hmang an tih ti an ṭih a.
Nisienlakhawm, sipai za hotu chun Paula sanhim a nuom a, an thil tum chu a khap a. Tui inhlieu thei po tuisuorieta chun inchâwm thlâk a, khawmuol lo kai hmasa ding le,
mi danghai chu, a ṭhen thingphêk chunghaiah, a ṭhen lawng thuomhnaw dang chunghaiah kai dingin thu a pêk a. Chuong ang chun an rêngin khawmuolah himtakin an kai seng tah a.
